name: Gamestar Dark, 2020
description: Dark Theme f체r gamestar.de. Features: - Dark Theme f체r die gesamte Webseite* - nur Farbanpassungen, keine Layoutmodifikationen - leicht anpassbar (einfach die Farbvariablen am Anfang des Themes anpassen) * Forum und Blogs werden aktuell nicht unterst체tzt, der Theme wird auf diesen Seiten automatisch deaktiviert. Allerdings gibt es in den Forumseinstellungen bereits einen Dark Theme. Weitere Bilder: Vollst채ndige News Im Falle von Problemen einfach melden. Wenn ich Zeit habe, fix ich es ;).
additional_info:
Changelog:
v 3.0.5 - adjustments for updated start page
            - added support  for Gamestar-Plus Teaser
v 3.0.3 - fixed modal background color
v 3.0.2 - fixed background color of comment user panel
v 3.0.1 - fixed cookie hint background color
v 3.0.0 - 'breaking change': changed background color of center content block to match gamestars original light theme
            - fixed multiple small color issues
            - improved contrast
v 2.0.5 - fixed border color around cards in gamestar plus slider
v 2.0.4  - fixed news title color on news page
v 2.0.3  - fixed news text color on start page
v 2.0.2:  - fix Gamestar Plus Button
v 2.0.1:  - better sticky video background color
v  2.0.0  - support for new start page
v 1.0.9 : - force dark background on start page (was white for non-adblock/non-premium users)
              - improved Gamestar-Plus-Icon in news list on start page
              - fix font color on competition pages
              - fixed background color for input fields (should now be visible)
              - fixed issues on create user game review page
              - fixed background color in some dropdowns
v 1.0.8 fixed table header background and blockquote text-color
v 1.0.7 fixed citation text color in comments
v 1.0.6: fixed several problems on hardware pages
v 1.0.4: fixed hover problems introduced with 1.0.2
v 1.0.3: fixed fader
v 1.0.2: fixed missing link-hover-highlight-color
v 1.0.1: fix Tag background
v 1.0.0: erste Version
